title: Tru-Ray® Heavyweight Construction Paper Pad, 10 Assorted Colors, 9" x 12", 50 Sheets
description: Convenient padded options offered as part of our premium line of Tru-Ray Sulphite Construction Paper! The perfect choice for all art projects. Bright colors resist fading and have a smooth finish. Colors include: White, Orange, Yellow, Holiday Green, Pink, Blue, Sky Blue, Warm Brown, Black, and Holiday Red. Acid-free for less fade. Recyclable.
